verses.verse: An oracle.<WH4853> The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> concerning Israel.<WH3478> Yahweh,<WH3068> who stretches<WH5186> out the heavens,<WH8064> and lays the foundation<WH3245> of the earth,<WH776> and forms<WH3335> the spirit<WH7307> of man<WH120> within<WH7130> him says:<WH5002>

"Behold,<WH7760> I will make Jerusalem<WH3389> a cup<WH5592> of reeling<WH7478> to all the surrounding<WH5439> peoples,<WH5971> and on Judah<WH3063> also will it be in the siege<WH4692> against Jerusalem.<WH3389>

It will happen in that day,<WH3117> that I will make<WH7760> Jerusalem<WH3389> a burdensome<WH4614> stone<WH68> for all the peoples.<WH5971> All who burden<WH6006> themselves with it will be severely wounded,<WH8295> and all the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776> will be gathered together against it.<WH622>

In that day,<WH3117>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "I will strike<WH5221> every horse<WH5483> with terror,<WH8541> and his rider<WH7392> with madness;<WH7697> and I will open<WH6491> my eyes<WH5869> on the house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> and will strike<WH5221> every horse<WH5483> of the peoples<WH5971> with blindness.<WH5788>

The chieftains<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> will say<WH559> in their heart,<WH3820> <WH3427> 'The inhabitants of Jerusalem<WH3389> are my strength<WH556> in Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> their God.<WH430>'

In that day<WH3117> I will make<WH7760> the chieftains<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> like a pan<WH3595> of fire<WH784> among wood,<WH6086> and like a flaming<WH784> torch<WH3940> among sheaves;<WH5995> and they will devour<WH398> all the surrounding<WH5439> peoples,<WH5971> on the right hand<WH3225> and on the left;<WH8040> and Jerusalem<WH3389> will yet again dwell<WH3427> in their own place,<WH3389> even in Jerusalem.

Yahweh<WH3068> also will save<WH3467> the tents<WH168> of Judah<WH3063> first,<WH7223> that the glory<WH8597> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> and the glory<WH8597> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> not be magnified<WH1431> above Judah.<WH3063>

In that day<WH3117> Yahweh<WH3068> will defend<WH1598> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389> He who is feeble<WH3782> among them at that day<WH3117> will be like David,<WH1732> and the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> will be like God,<WH430> like the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> before them.<WH6440>
It will happen in that day,<WH3117> that I will seek<WH1245> to destroy<WH8045> all the nations<WH1471> that come<WH935> against Jerusalem.<WH3389>

I will pour<WH8210> on the house<WH1004> of David,<WH1732> and on the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the spirit<WH7307> of grace<WH2580> and of supplication;<WH8469> and they will look<WH5027> to me whom they have pierced;<WH1856> and they shall mourn<WH4553> for him,<WH5594> as one mourns for his only<WH3173> son,<WH4843> and will grieve bitterly for him,<WH4843> as one grieves for his firstborn.<WH1060>
In that day<WH3117> there will be a great<WH1431> mourning<WH4553> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> like the mourning<WH4553> of Hadadrimmon<WH1910> in the valley<WH1237> of Megiddon.<WH4023>

The land<WH776> will mourn,<WH5594> every<WH4940> family<WH4940> apart;<WH905> the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> apart,<WH802> and their wives apart;<WH4940> the family of the house<WH1004> of Nathan<WH5416> apart,<WH802> and their wives apart;
the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> apart,<WH802> and their wives apart;<WH4940> the family of the Shimeites<WH8097> apart,<WH802> and their wives apart;
all the families<WH4940> who remain,<WH7604> every family<WH4940> apart,<WH802> and their wives apart.
